cards.name: Eye of the Time Dragon

effect.command: Select a minion and take up to the top 5 cards of its /ancestry/. Deal 1 damage to the selected minion for each card taken.
effect.reshuffle: You can select a minion. Add the top 3 cards in this minion's /ancestry/ and add it to the targetted minion's /ancestry/.

cards.flavor: An ancient, beautiful gem that sees you as you see it.

cards.name: Nerisaurus

effect.hex: Select any 2 minions. For each minion selected, take any card from its /ancestry/, and put the card on the top of the other minion's /ancestry/.
effect.ancestor: When a card is summoned over this minion, take the top card of any minion's /ancestry/ and swap it with this card, preserving position.

cards.flavor: An elder dinosaur said to be the ancestor of many.

cards.name: Mandrake

effect.trait: Deal 2 damage to any enemy minion whenever they switch. Neither player can summon a non-Ancient card over this minion.
effect.ancestor: Deal 2 damage to any friendly minion whenever they switch.

cards.flavor: Nobody knows whether this is a creature, a plant, or a bit of both.

cards.name: Diamond-scaled Raptor

effect.trait: Whenever this minion is targetted for a /Hex/ effect, add the top card of the deck to the top of this minion's /ancestry/.
effect.ancestor: When this minion resolves its /Hex/ effect, reshuffle this card, and activate this minion's /Hex/ effect again.

cards.flavor: Those enchanted by the diamond will find themselves riddled with holes.

cards.name: Salamancer

effect.hex: Reshuffle up to top 3 cards from this minion's /ancestry/. For each card reshuffled, deal 1 damage to opposing minion.
effect.ancestor: Whenever your opponent draws an extra card from the deck, you may choose to put this card over this minion and activate this card's /Hex/ effect.

cards.flavor: A fiery reptile that fires... fire.

cards.name: Stone Serpent

effect.hex: You can choose to reshuffle a card from your hand to immediately activate its /Command/ effect.
effect.command: Take the top 3 cards from this minion's /ancestry/, and top 3 cards from the deck. Choose any 3 of these cards to put back in the /ancestry/, and return the rest on top of the deck.

cards.flavor: A serpent statue that feels very much alive.

cards.name: Dragon Hatchling

effect.hex: Add all other 'Dragon Hatchlings' from any minion's /ancestry/ to this minon's /ancestry/.
effect.ancestor: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to the opposing minion.

cards.flavor: Already lethal to most in its infancy.

cards.name: Hydra

effect.command: Return the top card from all friendly minion's /ancestry/. Activate any /Hex/ effect of the returned cards, from left to right.
effect.ancestor: At the end of your turn, you may choose to swap this card with a card from your hand.

cards.flavor: A beast of legend, currently with 4 heads.

cards.name: Reptile Guardian

effect.command: If at an inner rank, switches to the nearest outer rank. Otherwise, switch to the nearest inner rank.
effect.switch: After switching, put the top card of opposing minion's /ancestry/ to this minion's /ancestry/.
effect.trait: When an effect is targeting this minion, you can cancel the effect by putting 2 cards from your hand on top of that minion's /ancestry/.

cards.flavor: An armored, humanoid caiman with sword and shield.

boss.name: Arathurg the Time Dragon
boss.summon: On a minion that is gaining /ancestry/, if that minion end up having 10 or more /ancestry/.
boss.return: When this minion loses 4 or more /ancestry/ in a turn.

effect.command: Deal 5 damage to a minion of your choice. Take the top 3 card from the targeted minion's /ancestry/ and put it on top of this minion's /ancestry/.
effect.trait: For each card added to its /ancestry/, reshuffle the bottom card from its /ancestry/.
